oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |xam words and sentences, which appear to refer to parts of the body. Names of portions of the body of an animal. By lhan=kasso (L VIII.-31. 8774, 8772 rev. and 8773 rev.). 1) This story is found in Book VIII-31.
